name: Daisy_Packard
text:
Daisy Packard
Daisy Packard was the manager of the Packard Sawmill during the 1940s.
Biography
Following the start of World War II, Daisy was given management of the Packard family's sawmill. By 1945, she had become known as one of the most innovative business leaders in the state of Washington.
During her tenure as manager, mechanical barkers, a skyhook cable car, and a wigwam burner were introduced to the mill.
